itemDisplayName: SharePoint 2016 and 2013 configured with ADFS authentication
description: This template deploys SharePoint 2013 or 2016 with 3 VMs (DC, SQL and SharePoint), each with a public IP address and a subnet protected with a Network Security Group. Domain Controller runs ADCS, ADFS, and 2 additional DNS zones to support SharePoint apps. SharePoint has 1 web application with 2 zones. Default zone uses Windows authentication and Intranet zone uses federated authentication with ADFS. Latest version of claims provider LDAPCP is installed and configured. User Profile and Apps (addins) services are fully configured.
summary: This template deploys a full SharePoint 2013 or 2016 environment with 3 VMs (DC, SQL and SharePoint). It has 1 web application using Windows and ADFS authentication. UPA and addins are configured.
